#### Tender Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting tenders for the replacement of the existing fire alarm system at the Telegraph Creek Detachment in British Columbia. The proposed system will be an addressable type system. The works include:
* Replacement of the existing fire alarm system with a new adressable system, including the replacement of all existing fire alarm components and the addition of new devices where required.
* Provision of all materials and labor, including the installation of conduit and wiring for connection to a third-party monitoring company.
* Provision of fire watch services to meet National Fire Code requirements during the installation and when the building is occupied and the fire alarm system is non-operational.
* Detailed work plan, including a project schedule and phasing prior to start of the work.
* Provision of detailed shop drawings.
* Provision of all close out documents, including as-built drawings and operation and maintenance manual.
* Provision of all required testing, verification, and training services.

The tender is subject to competitive - selective tendering, and the lowest price will be the basis for selection. The tender closing date was previously amended and the current tender date is August 15, 2023. Tenders must be received by 2:00 PM Pacific Time on the closing date to be considered.
